283 "You know who’s going to purchase the 50 year mortgage?
Immigrants that pack the home in with the entire extended family.
America is finished unless you SHUT DOWN the border.
This is not up for discussion." posted 3 days ago by bleeje 8 comments award share report block Peter B @realpeteyb123 • 3d You know who’s going to purchase the 50 year mortgage? Immigrants that pack the home in with the entire extended family. America is finished unless you SHUT DOWN the border. This is not up for discussion.
